item.title: Longest Palindromic Substring (leetcode 5)
item.description: Problem Given a string s, return the longest palindromic substring in s. Example 1: Input: s = "babad" Output: "bab" Explanation: "aba" is also a valid answer.Example 2: Input: s = "cbbd" Output: "bb"Constraints: 1 <= s.length <= 1000 s consist of only digits and English letters. Solution class Solution { public String longestPalindrome(String s) { String result = ""; int maxLength = 0; for(int i = 0; i < s.
